title: How Chinese entities are already using Nvidia's powerful H200 AI chips

title: IIT Ropar’s AI-Data Engineering records highest jump: Most opted courses in 2025
description: One of the biggest highlights this year is Artificial Intelligence and Data Engineering, which has emerged as one of IIT Ropar’s fastest-growing programmes. The course registered a remarkable 17.27 per cent rise, increasing from 13,764 choices in 2024 to 16,141 in 2025.
content: Mathematics and Computing continues its upward trajectory as well, recording a 15.35 per cent increase — from 11,493 choices to 13,257. The programme attracts students looking for mathematically intensive pathways that feed directly into algorithm de... [1891 chars]

title: There's no humanity to it: Leonardo DiCaprio on Artificial Intelligence
description: The 'Titanic' actor gave examples of the songs made with AI tools and said they are quickly forgotten.
content:
Hollywood star Leonardo DiCaprio says Artificial Intelligence could be an “enhancement tool”, but it lacks humanity, which eventually makes it distant from art.

title: OpenAI warns new models pose 'high' cybersecurity risk
description: OpenAI said on Wednesday the cyber capabilities of its artificial intelligence models are increasing and warned that upcoming models are likely to pose a “high” cybersecurity risk.
content:

title: Leonardo DiCaprio on AI: Enhancing Art or Missing Humanity?
description: Leonardo DiCaprio discusses the role of Artificial Intelligence in art, expressing concerns about its lack of humanity. While AI can serve as an enhancement tool for filmmakers, DiCaprio believes true art must originate from human creativity, citing the transient nature of AI-generated music.
content: Hollywood icon Leonardo DiCaprio weighed in on the ongoing debate about the role of Artificial Intelligence in the arts. While acknowledging its potential as an 'enhancement tool,' DiCaprio emphasized the importance of human creativity, labeling AI a... [689 chars]

title: Nvidia builds location verification tech that could help fight chip smuggling
description: SAN FRANCISCO: Nvidia has built location verification technology that could indicate which country its chips are operating in, the company confirmed on Wednesday, a move that could help prevent its artificial intelligence chips from being smuggled into countries where their export is banned.

title: Cisco, once at the centre of dot com revolution, in focus as shares hit record after more than 25 years
description: Thanks in part to the surge in artificial intelligence investment, Cisco Systems Inc., a symbol of the dot-com technology revolution, has hit a record after 25 years. Investors and market analysts are comparing today's Magnificent Seven-led rally to the previous time it reached an all-time high, which coincides with Cisco's ascent to a new record.
content:
On Wednesday, shares increased 0.9% to $80.25, surpassing a peak that had stood for more than 25 years. Up until late 2015, the tech-heavy Nasdaq 100 Index reached its peak on March 27, 2000, which many consider to be the peak of the dot-com bubble.
